levels.description: This single-level minimalist farmhouse is designed with a focus on natural light and ventilation, ensuring a comfortable living environment within the constraints of a tight budget. The layout respects local building norms and integrates Vastu principles by aligning entry points and open spaces to enhance positive energy flow.
